resources.string: Adjust how strongly the phone tilt moves the player horizontally.
Tilt to steer, land on platforms, and climb the Glyph Matrix.
Bounce your way up the Nothing Phone 3 Glyph Matrix. The service renders entirely on the 25×25 LEDs and reacts instantly to device tilt.
- Long-press the Glyph button to start, pause, resume, or restart.
- Tilt left or right to steer the player horizontally.
- Stay above the camera by landing on platforms; falling ends the run.
- Bouncy platforms launch you higher; moving platforms slide underneath you.
- Your score appears centered on the matrix when the game ends.
